description: Returns backup job details for the specified BackupJobId.

parameters.name: BackupJobId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies a request to Backup to back up a resource.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: Returns the account ID that owns the backup job.

nested_items.name: BackupJobId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a request to Backup to back up a resource.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Amazon Web Services Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a saved resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup job is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a job to create a backup job is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of a backup job.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message explaining the status of the job to back up a resource.

nested_items.name: PercentDone
nested_items.description: Contains an estimated percentage that is complete of a job at the time the job status was queried.

nested_items.name: BackupSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of a backup.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the IAM role ARN used to create the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Contains identifying information about the creation of a backup job, including the BackupPlanArn, BackupPlanId, BackupPlanVersion, and BackupRuleId of the backup plan that is used to create it.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a backup plan.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup plan; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:plan:8F81F553-3A74-4A3F-B93D-B3360DC80C50.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanVersion
nested_items.description: Version IDs are unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded strings that are at most 1,024 bytes long. They cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: BackupRuleId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a rule used to schedule the backup of a selection of resources.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource to be backed up; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database.

nested_items.name: BytesTransferred
nested_items.description: The size in bytes transferred to a backup vault at the time that the job status was queried.

nested_items.name: ExpectedCompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a job to back up resources is expected to be completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of ExpectedCompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: StartBy
nested_items.description: Specifies the time in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) when a backup job must be started before it is canceled. The value is calculated by adding the start window to the scheduled time. So if the scheduled time were 6:00 PM and the start window is 2 hours, the StartBy time would be 8:00 PM on the date specified. The value of StartBy is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: BackupOptions
nested_items.description: Represents the options specified as part of backup plan or on-demand backup job.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: BackupType
nested_items.description: Represents the actual backup type selected for a backup job. For example, if a successful Windows Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS) backup was taken, BackupType returns "WindowsVSS". If BackupType is empty, then the backup type was a regular backup.

nested_items.name: ParentJobId
nested_items.description: This returns the parent (composite) resource backup job ID.

nested_items.name: IsParent
nested_items.description: This returns the boolean value that a backup job is a parent (composite) job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfChildJobs
nested_items.description: This returns the number of child (nested) backup jobs.

nested_items.name: ChildJobsInState
nested_items.description: This returns the statistics of the included child (nested) backup jobs.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The non-unique name of the resource that belongs to the specified backup.

nested_items.name: InitiationDate
nested_items.description: The date a backup job was initiated.

nested_items.name: MessageCategory
nested_items.description: The job count for the specified message category.
